speakers.name: Zara – Sweet & Friendly Companion
speakers.description: A light, cheerful voice that feels like a genuine friend by your side.
speakers.best_used_for: Conversational AI, friendly interactions, companion apps

speakers.name: Tara - Expressive Conversational Hindi Voice
speakers.description: Tara's English voice has already generated millions of characters. She is a professional actress with extensive acting experience and great potential ahead. You'll hear all those emotions in her voice. Give it a try, and I'm sure you'll love her Hindi voice too.
speakers.best_used_for: Conversational bots, emotional storytelling, voice assistants

speakers.name: Nara – Tier 2 & 3 Native Indian Girl Tone for Localised Bots
speakers.description: Nara has the warm, unfiltered tone of a typical Tier 2 & Tier 3 Indian girl — casual, simple, and effortlessly real.
speakers.best_used_for: Localised bots, regional content, authentic Indian conversations

speakers.name: Pratima - Casual Hindi Conversational Voice
speakers.description: Pratima is the pen name of a passionate actress. Her voice has been recorded in a very natural, conversational style, making it perfect for all use cases where a raw, authentic voice is needed. Give it a try, and you'll find her voice to be highly relatable.
speakers.best_used_for: Casual conversations, relatable content, natural interactions

speakers.name: Saavi - Recovery & Payment Reminder Voice Agent Banks, NBFCs & Lending Firms
speakers.description: A clear, firm, and polite female voice designed for recovery, payment reminders, and follow-ups.
speakers.best_used_for: Financial services, payment reminders, banking communications

speakers.name: Gargi - Girl Next Door
speakers.description: Gargi has a raw voice that feels less like AI and more like the girl next door. Her authenticity brings a relatable charm, making every interaction personal and warm. Whether narrating stories or voicing customer support, her tone feels natural and engaging. From educational content to podcasts and interactive assistants, Gargi's voice adds familiarity and trust.
speakers.best_used_for: Customer support, storytelling, educational content, podcasts

speakers.name: Priyanka Sogam – Romantic, Polished & Calm
speakers.description: A soft, velvety voice dipped in elegance — warm, slow-paced, and effortlessly alluring.
speakers.best_used_for: Romantic content, polished presentations, calming experiences

speakers.name: Anika - Soothing Customer Care Agent
speakers.description: Anika is a calm, empathetic, and listener-first voice, specially crafted for customer service experiences.
speakers.best_used_for: Customer care, empathetic interactions, support services

speakers.name: Customer Care Tripti – Calm, Experienced Voice for Hindi AI Bots & Agents
speakers.description: A composed and reassuring Hindi voice built for AI-driven customer support, IVRs, and virtual agents.
speakers.best_used_for: AI customer support, IVR systems, virtual agents

speakers.name: Anjali - Soothing Hindi Voice
speakers.description: Anjali's soothing voice is perfect for creating calming and engaging content. You can use it for audiobooks, podcasts, meditation apps, or any project that needs a friendly and reassuring tone.
speakers.best_used_for: Audiobooks, podcasts, meditation, calming content

speakers.name: Uma - Blunt Conversational Voice for Real Talk, Reels & Sarcasm
speakers.description: Uma delivers a bold, sarcastic, and brutally honest tone.
speakers.best_used_for: Real talk, reels, sarcastic content, authentic conversations

speakers.name: Simran – Bright, Fun, and Friendly BFF Voice for Gen Z Gossip
speakers.description: A bubbly, expressive voice that sounds just like your favorite friend spilling tea over texts.
speakers.best_used_for: Gen Z content, gossip, friendly conversations, social media

speakers.name: Roopa – Clear & Natural Female Customer Care Agent
speakers.description: Roopa's voice is naturally modulated, clear, & emotionally aware—crafted specifically for customer support, IVR flows, & human-sounding bots. Her tone effortlessly balances professionalism with relatability, making her ideal for BFSI, e-commerce, logistics, & edtech sectors.
speakers.best_used_for: Customer support, IVR, BFSI, e-commerce, logistics, edtech

speakers.name: Monika Sogam - Friendly Customer Care Agent
speakers.description: A warm and approachable voice designed for exceptional customer service.
speakers.best_used_for: Customer service, friendly interactions, support

speakers.name: Swati S – Young Romantic Female Voice for Podcasts & Voice bots
speakers.description: A soft, romantic young female voice with a natural conversational style that feels warm, relatable, and emotionally engaging.
speakers.best_used_for: Podcasts, voice bots, romantic content, emotional storytelling

speakers.name: Riya Rao - Hindi Conversational Voice
speakers.description: Riya is the pen name of one of the most professional voice-over artists you will ever hear on ElevenLabs. Her voice has already been a part of major conversational bots in the past. Use it for all your professional and conversational needs, such as social media, documentaries, audiobooks, corporate videos, and so on.
speakers.best_used_for: Professional content, conversational bots, social media, documentaries, audiobooks, corporate videos

speakers.name: Sia – Casual & Comforting Girl Voice for AI Chatbots & Apps
speakers.description: A friendly, comforting voice designed for relaxed chats and emotionally aware AI interactions.
speakers.best_used_for: AI chatbots, casual conversations, comforting interactions

speakers.name: Ayesha - Energetic Hindi Voice
speakers.description: Ayesha is the pen name of a very famous and talented voice over artist and singer. Her voice is well-suited for conversational-style ads, podcasts, narrations, e-learning, engaging content, etc. Do give it a try and you will love it.
speakers.best_used_for: Ads, podcasts, narrations, e-learning, engaging content

speakers.name: Alisha - Soft-Spoken Young female for Customer Care
speakers.description: Alisha's gentle, warm voice is ideal for empathetic and friendly customer interactions in Hindi.
speakers.best_used_for: Customer care, empathetic interactions, friendly support

speakers.name: Arvi – Desi Conversational Voice
speakers.description: A lively and authentic Hindi voice designed for casual, everyday conversations with a distinct desi touch.
speakers.best_used_for: Casual conversations, desi content, authentic Indian interactions
